subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Dave van den Bergh scored on a left-footed free kick from about 25 yards out in the 39th minute Thursday night as the Red Bulls endeed Toronto F.C.’s three-game winning streak.
snippet: Dave van den Bergh scored on a left-footed free kick from about 25 yards out in the 39th minute Thursday night as the Red Bulls endeed Toronto F.C.’s three-game winning streak.
